content: *****as of february 3 2020 all of my pattern designs not included are collaborations are free this means i will no longer be providing support for these patterns i would like to thank everyone who has supported me in the past ** i designed this pattern with the drape and stretch of soy in mind silk or any fiber that tends to stretch when worn would also work nicely if choosing to knit this with a material other than the one recommended please use the washed and worn gauge included with the pattern knit from the bottom up with little seaming shoulder seams only it is a quick and flattering project gauge above is unwashed washed and blocked gauge taken from the top after being washed and worn for a day is 20 sts = 10 cm 4 also if using a yarn other than the recommended or other yarn that stretches with wear ensure that you compensate for the length of the garment when knitting especially in the armholes they are tight to accommodate the stretching of the soy i would suggest 1 5cm 5 - 2 5cm 1 depending on how loose you like the arm holes also the neckline should say pick up and knit not just pick up
